pullRequest.title: Introduce RetainingAsyncWritableChannel
pullRequest.bodyText:
This channel is a replacement for CopyingAsyncWritableChannel that does
not require copying input buffers if supplied a ByteBuf from
the caller. These buffer will just be retained by incrementing the ref
count and added to a CompositeByteBuf.

commit.message:
Introduce RetainingAsyncWritableChannel

This channel is a replacement for CopyingAsyncWritableChannel that does
not require copying input buffers if supplied a ByteBuf from
the caller. These buffer will just be retained by incrementing the ref
count and added to a CompositeByteBuf.
Close InputStream after NettyServerRequest has been handled
Address Ze's comments; still looking into test failure
